CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: [Android] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
CurrentVersion.description: Now while writing an email, you can reorder tools to customize your experience and make your most used actions even easier to reach.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: [Android] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
OldVersion.description: Now while writing an email, you can reorder tools to customize your experience and make your most used actions even easier to reach.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: [iOS] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
CurrentVersion.description: Now while writing an email you can reordering the tools, customizing your experience and making your most used actions even easier to reach.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: [iOS] Customizable Compose Toolbar and Drawer
OldVersion.description: Now while writing an email you can reordering the tools, customizing your experience and making your most used actions even easier to reach.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Tunnel - Gateway Scaling
CurrentVersion.description: Increase the number of clients supported per Tunnel gateway server from 5,000 to over 20,000 per server.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Microsoft Tunnel - Gateway Scaling
OldVersion.description: Increase the number of clients supported per Tunnel gateway server from 5,000 to over 20,000 per server.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Remote Help for Mac - Full control
CurrentVersion.description: Provide full control on Mac devices to reduce time to mitigation.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Remote Help for Mac - Full control
OldVersion.description: Provide full control on Mac devices to reduce time to mitigation.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
OldVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Add new questions to Question Library as Pulse admin
CurrentVersion.description: Pulse admins can create new questions that become available in their users' Question Library.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel Copilot supports generating multiple formula columns from a single prompt
CurrentVersion.description: Users can ask Copilot to generate multiple formula columns suggestions at once, from a single prompt, such as "split the name into first name and last name."

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Organizational messages
CurrentVersion.description: ,Organizational messages allows enterprises to connect with their organization through customized messages, enabling them to engage directly within the Microsoft product experiences they use every day, like Windows Spotlight.  Starting Spring 2024, Organizational messages will be found under the “Reports” section within the Microsoft 365 admin center and will include features for admins to centrally manage their tenant’s messages, create new messages, and review delivery reports.
